By Creating a passcode, you agree to our Terms & Condition and Privacy Policy Add money Send money Request money Your PayWell account has been created Done Create a passcode Confirm a passcode for your PayWell account Type of Document Submit document which proves that you live in Bangladesh Continue Email succesfully verified Your account is now even more secure Verify your NID again Retake your selfie again My details are captured properly Take a new picture Almost there! We just need to verify your identity to protect our community against financial crimes. It should only take a minute or two. You will be able to transfer money to any one and pay for any product or service after this verification. Verify identity Top up your account with ৳500 or more Before we hook you up with an account, you need to top up. You can spend or withdraw this money later. Lost access to your number? What’s your home address No PO Boxes, please Present Address Permanent address Permanent address* House/Holding No. Village/Road Postal code And what’s your primary email? What do you want to do Frequency: Contact details Name: Phone number: Recurring transfers Next transfer date: Daily Active Your next transfer will occur on 01 April Transfer from: GIF Select amount Select a contact Add a new contact Beneficiaries - 1 Friends on PayWell -3 Recommended - Usually arrives instantly from leading banks Scheduled Transfer Schedule a new transfer Directly from your bank Add Visa or Mastercard Rocket Nagad Card number: 08/23 You can review your transfer any time in your transaction log Make this a recurring payment Transfer to your PayWell account For using in your internet banking beneficiary addition page Beneficiary account number Beneficiary bank, branch NPSB transfers takes 5 to 10 minutes to appear in your PayWell account BEFTN transfers between 12 AM and 2 PM usually appears next day 1st half, transfers between 2:01 PM and 11:59 PM appears next day 2nd half in your PayWell account Select a transfer frequency Every week Every month Set up S M T W F You’ve set up a recurring payment to IPDC Finance Limited *467 The next payment of 20,000 Tk. will occur on 16 April 2020 Your recurring transfer of ৳200 will be deactivated. You will be able to activate it at any time later. Deactivate recurring transfer? Deactivate Your recurring transfer of ৳200 will be deleted permanently. Delete recurring transfer to Raihan Ahmed?  You would need to specify the amount, reference and mobile number or email in an excel or csv file, once uploaded here below, it will prompt you to reconfirm and after your confirmation, all funds will be sent to the designated accounts. Send fund - bulk You may upload a .csv or .xlsx file using
the below button Please download the sample file linked below to create the bulk uploadable file Download sample file to be sent for approval? making transactions Domestic Domestic or International Allowed countries Security The current card will be terminated & a new card will be issued on this card holder’s name. This action is irreversible. Freeze the card if you want to temporarily disable it. Terminate card Order a replacement card Online transactions Internet-based transactions are generally high-risk. You can switch them off for extra security. Online transactions Location-based security We’ll use your location to help prevent fraudulent transactions if your card is ever compromised. GPS must be turned on. Call to enable/disable Sometimes cards can be cloned. Switch off the magnetic stripe for extra security. Contactless payments If you do not use contactless payments, you can swithch them off for extra security. If you do not plan withdraw cash, you can switch ATM withdrawals off.
